subject:
New Assembly and Component postings: $37,000+ in prizes, plus DR
 points
body:
Hello sm1lies, 

There are now 7 new Assembly Competitions open for registration, with combined first- and second-place prizes of $31,500. See below for details, as well as information on some new Design & Development Competitions that opened today.

===========================================
Note: Participating in these Assembly Competitions can earn you points in the new Digital Run Assembly Cup competition. $90,000 in prizes will be divided among the top Assembly competitors. Get in on the game now! 
Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=Static&d1=digital_run&d2=2007dot5&d3=asmOverview
===========================================

The current open contests include:

* Morpheus Survey Assembly: $4,500 in prizes The goal for this application assembly contest is to assemble, configure, test and debug the components for the Morpheus Survey Application. This application is a servlet-based web application and 100% of the application code resides in the components. The technologies involved include Java, JSP, Servlet, JDBC, and HTML.
 - First prize: $3,000
 - Second prize: $1,500
More details are available here: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ProjectDetail&pj=30001613

* SMC Assembly Competitions: Six competitions, $27,000 in total prizes.
The SMC (Site Management Console) is a Server Client Application which allows users to create Calendar Entries and create reports. The Site Management Console is necessary to coordinate and organize different marketing and sales activities to create on time new landing pages for an eCommerce site. The technologies involved include C#, WinForms Controls, .NET 2.0 and SQL Server 2005.	
 - First prize for each: $3,000
 - Second prize for each: $1,500
  Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewAssemblyActiveContests

* New Component Competitions:

 Design:
 - .NET Message Processing Framework Version 2.0 ($1,200.00)
 - .NET SSIS Data Flow Task Version 1.0 ($1,200.00)
  Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=112

 Development:
 - Java Response Email Processor Version 1.0 ($500.00)
 - Custom Java Shift Email Messaging Version 1.0 ($500.00)
 - Java Location Service Version 1.1 ($250.00)
 - Java HTTP Utility Version 2.0 ($500.00)
  Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=113

Good luck! 

- The TopCoder Software Team
